cupp::exception::cuda_runtime_error

cupp::exception::cuda_runtime_error Class Reference

This exception is thrown when an low-level CUDA error occurs, eg. an internal call to cudaMalloc fails. More...

Public Member Functions

 cuda_runtime_error (cudaError_t error)
 Generates an exception with the error number error.
char const * what () const throw ()

Detailed Description

This exception is thrown when an low-level CUDA error occurs, eg. an internal call to cudaMalloc fails.

Author:
Jens Breitbart
Version:
0.1
Date:
13.06.2007
The returned error string is a default CUDA error string.
